name: Bironite Glitch - Demo
description:
The negative energies(cynics) renounced by monks are trying to get back inside the monks body by destroying the bironite (the healing force elemental crystal).
Help the monks by defending the Bironite and killing all cynics.

This is the basic gameplay presented in demo version.

Music:
Daniel Deluxe - Star Eater
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QHNak...
